name: 4Chan Clutter Killer
description: Removes the annoying clutter from 4chan boards, fast and simple. Completely hide the Announcement, the rotating board's banner, and all the text explaining the "rules". Works with all themes.

user.name: moistrous
user.about:
Enough about me! Let's talk about you!

How are the wife and kids?

additional_info:
Version 1.0
* Removes the Announcement box completely
* Gets rid of the image banner that rotates at the top of each board
* Strips out the text list of rules, below the new post form
* Removes an extraneous HR (horizontal rule) that resulted from hiding announcement box

The captcha verification field is still visible, and it will look different depending on whether you have a 4Chan Pass. I'll be making updates or improvements as necessary. Thanks.
